name: When I Die (g82game)
description:
ATTENTION:

At first I uploaded wrong version, so the first dialog in game was missing, now it's fixed.

STORY:

Story of Mighty Hero on a quest to The Dungeon. Events take an ugly turn when the first goblin in the hallway strikes a critical hit and kills YOU. Guided by a mysterious voice, Mighty Hero uses his newly obtained abilities as a ghost to possess the souls of the monster's enemies and navigate through all the levels. As you are finally reaching the deepest level of The Dungeon, you will reveal all its secrets.

FEATURES:

  • dad jokes & pop culture references
  • multiple solutions to action / puzzle-based levels
  • primitive enemy "state machine" AI and navigation
  • global leaderboards (speedruns, yay!)
  • up to 3x the word "WOWIE"
  • PLOT TWIST

CONTROLS:

  • WASD / arrow keys
    • movement
  • mouse left-click
    • attack
  • mouse right-click
    • special ability

CREDITS:

  • Tomas Smolik:
    • Art / Design / Coding / SFX / story  
  • Jan Hartman
    • Music                 

DISCLAIMER:

All graphical and sound assets were made for this game jam during 72-hour time limit. Leaderboards are run using silentwolf.com 

I had to disable camera shake for Linux and HTML build, since they were bugy.
